dataset_id: Collected Data from The Boreal Ecosystem-Atmosphere Study, NASA, CD-ROM
title: Collected Data from The Boreal Ecosystem-Atmosphere Study, NASA, CD-ROM
summary: This data set provides Boreal Ecosystem-Atmosphere Study (BOREAS) project information and data collected at selected sites in the boreal forest of Saskatchewan and Manitoba, Canada from 1993 through 1996. The data include surface, airborne, and satellite-based observations. Note that all of the data products on these CDs have been archived as separate BOREAS data sets by the ORNL DAAC and in many cases the published data are later versions. Users should search for BOREAS data among these individual data sets. These data were originally distributed on 12 CD-ROMs, but are now archived as 12 zip files to ensure historical completeness of the BOREAS data record.
